…cking and regression checks

Added GPU VRAM peak tracking to the performance monitor, alongside CPU peak memory collection. Updated documentation to reflect these changes and included GPU metrics in regression tracking for improved performance analysis.

commits.messageBody: Enhanced the run_tests script to accept optional positional arguments for direct pytest invocation, allowing users to specify test paths or patterns. This improves flexibility in running specific tests without altering the overall test execution strategy.
commits.messageHeadline: feat(tests): add support for optional test paths in run_tests script

commits.messageBody: Updated comments in the PdfPageImageNode schema and DocumentProcessor class to remove specific references to specifications, enhancing clarity. Added integration tests for PDF ingestion behaviors, ensuring proper emission of page-image nodes and OCR fallback functionality. Refactored unit tests for deterministic IDs and PDF page image utilities to remove specification references, maintaining focus on functionality.
